Texts.Eng: A bog-standard filtration drain. Ho hum.
Texts.Chs: 一个沼泽标准过滤排水管。呵呵。

Texts.Eng: A sophisticated pump and filtration system.
Seems to be draining all the water away. If I put my hand on it it makes a farting sound.
Texts.Chs: 好像把所有的水都排干了。如果我把手放在它上面，它会发出放屁的声音。

Texts.Eng: Sssucky hole in wall - where doesss the water go?
Texts.Chs: 墙上有个烂洞-水去哪儿了？

Texts.Eng: These drains are used to keep water out of our houses if some manages to make its way in. Wet fur's no fun on land.
Texts.Chs: 如果有人设法把水引进来的话，这些排水沟是用来防止水进入我们的房子的。湿毛皮在陆地上没有乐趣。

Texts.Eng: These powerful pumps drain water and pump it into the purification system.
Texts.Chs: 这些强大的水泵排出水并将其泵入净化系统。

Texts.Eng: This drain is generating a lot of suction - I'd better keep my fur away from it.
Texts.Chs: 这个排水管产生了很大的吸力——我最好让我的毛皮远离它。

Texts.Eng: This drain seems to pump water away really fast - I guess the Peglaci like some rooms dry.
Texts.Chs: 这个排水管好像能很快地把水抽走——我想佩格拉希族家的房间好像有些干了。
